html:
I implemented a variant of the famous Game of Life on a hexagonal grid. Pretty much all parameters of the game can be configured: rules for birth and survival, start configuration, duration, and color palette.

While researching for this project, I stumbled upon a very informative article that recommends the rule set B2/S34, which means that cells are born if surrounded by exactly 2 living cells and they survive if surrounded by 3 or 4 other live cells. This configuration produces some nice oscillators, e.g. this one:

I experimented with the rules configuration a bit and found another interesting set of rules: B1/S12. This configuration allows for very fast growth and often results in mesmerizing evolutions like the one below:

Feel free to play around as well!
